https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7hdFezTGLhBCmhuM34lbXRwegy4.jpg Srikant's life turns upside down when he bumps into a middle-aged ghost who claims to be his grandson from his previous birth. Things take an even more comical turn when the ghost seeks Srikant's help to meet his long-lost love. Atithi Bhooto Bhava
